defs.name: Cw20Contract
defs.docs:
Cw20Contract is a wrapper around HumanAddr that provides a lot of helpers
 for working with this.

attributes.value: / Cw20Contract is a wrapper around HumanAddr that provides a lot of helpers
/ for working with this.
/ If you wish to persist this, convert to Cw20CanonicalContract via .canonical()

defs.name: canonical
defs.docs: Convert this address to a form fit for storage

attributes.value: / Convert this address to a form fit for storage

defs.name: call
defs.value: pub fn call<T: Into<Cw20HandleMsg>>(&Self, T) -> StdResult<CosmosMsg>

defs.name: balance
defs.value: pub fn balance<Q: Querier>(&Self, &Q, HumanAddr) -> StdResult<Uint128>
defs.docs: Get token balance for the given address

attributes.value: / Get token balance for the given address

defs.name: meta
defs.docs:
Get metadata from the contract. This is a good check that the address
 is a valid Cw20 contract.

attributes.value: / Get metadata from the contract. This is a good check that the address
/ is a valid Cw20 contract.

defs.name: allowance
defs.value:
pub fn allowance<Q: Querier>(&Self, &Q, HumanAddr, HumanAddr)
-> StdResult<AllowanceResponse>
defs.docs: Get allowance of spender to use owner's account

defs.docs: returns true if the contract supports the allowance extension

attributes.value: / returns true if the contract supports the allowance extension

defs.docs: returns true if the contract supports the mintable extension

defs.name: Cw20CanonicalContract
defs.docs:
This is a respresentation of Cw20Contract for storage.
 Don't use it directly, just translate to the Cw20Contract when needed.

attributes.value: / This is a respresentation of Cw20Contract for storage.
/ Don't use it directly, just translate to the Cw20Contract when needed.

defs.name: human
defs.docs: Convert this address to a form fit for usage in messages and queries

attributes.value: / Convert this address to a form fit for usage in messages and queries

defs.name: Transfer
defs.docs: Transfer is a base message to move tokens to another account without triggering actions

attributes.value: / Transfer is a base message to move tokens to another account without triggering actions

defs.name: Burn
defs.docs: Burn is a base message to destroy tokens forever

attributes.value: / Burn is a base message to destroy tokens forever

defs.name: Send
defs.docs:
Send is a base message to transfer tokens to a contract and trigger an action
 on the receiving contract.

attributes.value: / Send is a base message to transfer tokens to a contract and trigger an action
/ on the receiving contract.

defs.name: IncreaseAllowance
defs.docs:
Only with "approval" extension. Allows spender to access an additional amount tokens
 from the owner's (env.sender) account. If expires is Some(), overwrites current allowance
 expiration with this one.

attributes.value: / Only with "approval" extension. Allows spender to access an additional amount tokens
/ from the owner's (env.sender) account. If expires is Some(), overwrites current allowance
/ expiration with this one.

defs.name: DecreaseAllowance
defs.docs:
Only with "approval" extension. Lowers the spender's access of tokens
 from the owner's (env.sender) account by amount. If expires is Some(), overwrites current
 allowance expiration with this one.

attributes.value: / Only with "approval" extension. Lowers the spender's access of tokens
/ from the owner's (env.sender) account by amount. If expires is Some(), overwrites current
/ allowance expiration with this one.

defs.name: TransferFrom
defs.docs:
Only with "approval" extension. Transfers amount tokens from owner -> recipient
 if `env.sender` has sufficient pre-approval.

attributes.value: / Only with "approval" extension. Transfers amount tokens from owner -> recipient
/ if `env.sender` has sufficient pre-approval.

defs.name: SendFrom
defs.docs:
Only with "approval" extension. Sends amount tokens from owner -> contract
 if `env.sender` has sufficient pre-approval.

attributes.value: / Only with "approval" extension. Sends amount tokens from owner -> contract
/ if `env.sender` has sufficient pre-approval.

defs.name: BurnFrom
defs.docs: Only with "approval" extension. Destroys tokens forever

attributes.value: / Only with "approval" extension. Destroys tokens forever

defs.name: Mint
defs.docs:
Only with the "mintable" extension. If authorized, creates amount new tokens
 and adds to the recipient balance.

attributes.value: / Only with the "mintable" extension. If authorized, creates amount new tokens
/ and adds to the recipient balance.

defs.name: Cw20HandleMsg

attributes.value: serde(rename_all = "snake_case")

defs.name: Balance
defs.docs:
Returns the current balance of the given address, 0 if unset.
 Return type: BalanceResponse.

attributes.value: / Returns the current balance of the given address, 0 if unset.
/ Return type: BalanceResponse.

defs.name: TokenInfo
defs.docs:
Returns metadata on the contract - name, decimals, supply, etc.
 Return type: TokenInfoResponse.

attributes.value: / Returns metadata on the contract - name, decimals, supply, etc.
/ Return type: TokenInfoResponse.

defs.name: Allowance
defs.docs:
Only with "allowance" extension.
 Returns how much spender can use from owner account, 0 if unset.
 Return type: AllowanceResponse.

attributes.value: / Only with "allowance" extension.
/ Returns how much spender can use from owner account, 0 if unset.
/ Return type: AllowanceResponse.

defs.name: Minter
defs.docs:
Only with "mintable" extension.
 Returns who can mint and how much.
 Return type: MinterResponse.

attributes.value: / Only with "mintable" extension.
/ Returns who can mint and how much.
/ Return type: MinterResponse.

defs.name: AllAllowances
defs.docs:
Only with "enumerable" extension (and "allowances")
 Returns all allowances this owner has approved. Supports pagination.
 Return type: AllAllowancesResponse.

attributes.value: / Only with "enumerable" extension (and "allowances")
/ Returns all allowances this owner has approved. Supports pagination.
/ Return type: AllAllowancesResponse.

defs.name: AllAccounts
defs.docs:
Only with "enumerable" extension
 Returns all accounts that have balances. Supports pagination.
 Return type: AllAccountsResponse.

attributes.value: / Only with "enumerable" extension
/ Returns all accounts that have balances. Supports pagination.
/ Return type: AllAccountsResponse.
